name: 42-libft
description: Libft is a foundational project at 42 where we implement their own C standard library functions, enhancing their understanding of memory management, string manipulation, and data structures.

name: minishell
description: Minishell involves creating a simple shell program, implementing basic shell commands, environment management, and command execution.

name: philo
description: Philosophers is a project at 42 that challenges us to simulate the classic dining philosophers problem, focusing on concurrency, synchronization, and avoiding deadlock in a multi-threaded environment.

name: push_swap
description: Push_swap is a project at 42 where we implement a sorting algorithm to arrange a stack of integers using a limited set of operations, focusing on efficiency and algorithm optimization.

name: so_long
description: So_long is a project at 42 that tasks us with creating a 2D game using the MiniLibX graphics library, emphasizing game mechanics, player interactions, and efficient rendering.

name: Matter-of-Size
description: A game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2024, where you play as a hero who can shrink and grow, using your size to your advantage to solve puzzles. Made with Unity, credits to my team members on the website

name: This Website!
description: This website was made using ReactJS + Vite and hosted on GitHub Pages.
